name: Dhaka-bd.com
overview:
Dhaka-bd.com was founded in 1999. The vision then and now is rooted in the belief that disruptive technologies based on open standards have the potential to be used as strategic business tools for creating competitive advantage.

Solution Offerings By power of Web Services, dhaka-bd.com delivers the following solutions:

  • Scratch to Special effect web site design
  • Website Redesign
  • Online Database Development
  • Portal Web Site System
  • E-commece Solution
  • Custom Animation
  • Yellowpages Like Online directory
  • Dedicated and Basic Hosting
